dcterms:description: The MCYT database consists of 330 users and 25 skilled forgeries per person performed by 5 different impostors. It includes dynamic signature data acquired with a WACOM graphics tablet at a sampling frequency of 100 Hz, capturing position, pressure, azimuth, and altitude angles.
dcterms:title: MCYT Database

dcterms:creator: D. Yeung
H. Chang
Y. Xiong
S. George
R. Kashi
T. Matsumoto
G. Rigoll
dcterms:description: The SVC database is similar to the MCYT database and was used in the first international signature verification competition. It includes 40 users with 20 genuine signatures and 20 skilled forgeries per user, collected over two sessions.
dcterms:title: SVC Database
